Uses of Interface
Game.Core.GameStateInterface

  • Packages that use GameStateInterface 
    Package Description
    Game.Core
    The core functionality of the game.
    Game.Items.Cards
    Contains all the cards that is implemented.

    • Uses of GameStateInterface in Game.Core

      Classes in Game.Core that implement GameStateInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameState
      GameState holds the current state of the game, the game and the cards being played will alter the state of the game.
      Fields in Game.Core declared as GameStateInterface 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameStateInterface UnoGame.gameState 
      Methods in Game.Core with parameters of type GameStateInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UnoGame.setGameState(GameStateInterface gameState) 
      abstract void AbstractGame.setGameState(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Set the internal GameStateInterface to be used by the game.

    • Uses of GameStateInterface in Game.Items.Cards

      Methods in Game.Items.Cards with parameters of type GameStateInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Wild.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Add this card to the activeCard of the gameState
      abstract void Special.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Alter the gamestate depending on the cards functionality
      void Skip.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Alter the gamestate by adding a skip that should be handled when determening the next players turn.
      void Reverse.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Alter the gamestate by calling the reverse method and changing the direction.
      void Plus4.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Alter the gamestate by getting the next player in line and adding 4 drawcard events to the player, also update the active card.
      void Plus2.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Alter the gamestate by getting the next player in line and adding draw events to that player Also update the active card.
      void Number.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Alter the active card to this card.
      abstract void Card.play(GameStateInterface gameState)
      Play method is a form of command pattern, where when processing cards the card itself will alter the gamestate depending on its functionality.
